Class MeshTA

  • java.lang.Object
    • ta.shape3D.mesh.MeshTA
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Animator.Animable, Animator.TemporarilyAnimable

extends java.lang.Object
implements Animator.TemporarilyAnimable

        draw all triangles of the Mesh in the OpenGL environment.
        Parameters:
        rendu - the renderer which is used for drawing triangle, you don't need to call the begin() method of this renderer before using this method.
        rendu -
        projectionMatrix - The projection matrix in which the mesh will be represented
